scripts.build: cd frontend && cd books_app && npm build
scripts.install-client: cd frontend && cd books_app && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run app" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run app" "cd frontend && cd books_app && npm start"
